etymologies: early 20th century: from marlinspike (with reference to its pointed snout)

definitions: a large edible billfish of warm seas that is a highly prized game fish and typically reaches a great weight.

notes.text: Genera Makaira and Tetrapterus, family Istiophoridae: several species, including the striped marlin (T. audax)

shortDefinitions: large edible billfish of warm seas
